definition: roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: These eave tiles are carved with many animal pictures.
sentences.chinese: 这些瓦当上都刻有各种各样的动物图案。

sentences.english: Like other forms of art, the art of tile ends is also a reflection of the social and economic structures.
sentences.chinese: 瓦当和其他艺术一样，也是一定社会经济形态的反映。

sentences.english: The tile ends in Shaanxi Province boasts deep traditional Chinese philosophy and traditional Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 陕西瓦当深含着中国传统文化和哲学思想。

sentences.english: Eaves Tiles have a strong artistic styles of different times.
sentences.chinese: 瓦当有着强烈的不同时代的艺术风格。

definition: interlocking wooden brackets between the top of a column and crossbeams used in traditional Chinese architecture
bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
to dig up/to appear in an excavation/unearthed/to come up out of the ground
